Message:
Suddenly, I was in
the royal capital, with no hint
of its destruction in sight.
Many a citizen were traversing
across a busy street.

And among them, the brethren who
I had slain with my own hands...

This must be a dream.
Even though I know it is one,
I just cannot...

As I stood there motionless,
Ophelia presented
Executioner to me.

“I return this sword
to you, Queen Amleth.
We have no more need of it.

Our day of freedom has come,
and the sword is no longer
the master of our fate.”

I expected to struggle with
the sheer weight of the sword,
only to find it strangely light.

“Queen Amleth.
Let go of your royal duties...

Instead, take me into your arms...
then allow me to feel
the whisper of your breath,
and the warmth of your body.”
